messages.subject: Attention Artists
messages.msgSnippet: I hope to get started on an art section for the website so if any of you would like to send me copies of your work that you d like included please feel free to
messages.messageBody:
I hope to get started on an art section for the website so if any of you
would like to send me copies of your work that you'd like included
please feel free to do so and let me know if you have any captions or
other info you'd like included.

Also if you know any non list members with Shinsengumi related art you
especially like please pass this info on to them as well.

--
Barbara Sheridan

http://www.barbarasheridan.net
